item.description:
Join Members and Guests of the South Shore Fitness Meetup Group as we participate in a 5k Walk/Run Fundraiser to benefit Alzheimer's Disease. 5k is approximately 3.1 miles. The walk is 1 mile but last year many people walked the 5K route.

Check-in at the Registration Table at the Braintree Town Hall after 8am. We'll meet in the parking lot. We'll try to regroup in the same area afterwards.

5k Walk/Run Road Race Fundraiser
Sunday, October 3rd
Race Starts @ 9:30am
Meet by 9am
Braintree Town Hall
One JFK Memorial Drive
Braintree, MA 02184

**NO ONLINE REGISTRATION IS AVAILABLE, PLEASE SEND IN A CHECK WITH THE REGISTRATION FORM AVAILABLE AT THIS ATTACHED LINK**

http://www.kintera.or...


Cost: $17 by September 29th, $20 on Race Day (Non-Refundable)
The first 100 people to register will receive a complimentary t-shirt.

Race Day Schedule
8am-9am:
Registration
9:30am:
Run/Walk begins
Post Race:
Awards, DJ, Refreshments & Prize drawings


RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by NOON on Saturday, October 2nd

Please Note in your RSVP Comments if you are Walking or Running.
Inclement Weather: The Road Race is taking place rain or shine.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions, Race Route and Additional Information:
http://www.kintera.or...
item.how_to_find_us: we can meet in the town hall parking lot

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Forget Me Not 5K Road Race
